channel.title: Help me with bows
channel.description: Hi i was thinking if its possible if u enter area with crystal bow full(u can range from far with that) right?IS it possible to amke area where u cant use that bow?

item.title: Help me with bows
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here is one example:

public boolean inArea = false;

public void checkinarea{ if (absX >= # && absX <= # && absY >= # && absY <= #){ inArea = true; }else{ inArea = false;}

checkinarea(); if (inArea){ useBow = false;}

You have to set the coordinates of that area, similar to a safezone.

Read full topic
